project.name: AikiInc Basic Data Handler Parent Project
project.description:
Aikiinc basic data handler parent project wrapper with base test configuration for the latest SpringFramework, Hibernate and DbUnit.
The motivation for this project is to wire SpringFramework, Hibernate and provide a mechanism to start designing or building an application from the bottom-up. Meaning create the model, for the project first then the services and User Interfer (UI). Handle or seed the projects data by populating the database with from POJO's (Plain Old Java Object) property file or DbUnit XML file.
As of Feb 2015 these where the latest versions: SpringFramework 4.1.4.RELEASE, Hibenate 4.5.1.Final and DbUnit 2.5.0.
